content.query:
CREATE DATABASE DataExplorationDB 
                COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE CannabisTax
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://raysynapsemgdvnetdlacct.dfs.core.windows.net/raysynapsemgdvnetdlacctfs')

/*
drop external table dbo.groups
drop external table dbo.groupmemberships
drop external data source [OED Data Lake Folder]
*/

/* Serverless is a query service/engine for data lake (CSV, Parquet).
Use OPENROWSET with external data source. */

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/DCC/CannabisTaxRevenues.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'CannabisTax',
            FORMAT='CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].C2='Q3xx'




/* CETAS
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/develop-tables-cetas

Right click on file, then create external table. Use that script. 
To ingest into Serverless, a table (external) must exist already. This means external table must be created in advance.

*/



--- Query multiple CSVs
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/DCC/TestCSV*.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'CannabisTax',
            FORMAT='CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].C2='Q3xx'


---Then create view, example
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[myView] AS
SELECT *
FROM [dbo].[myTable]
WHERE [myColumn] = 'myValue'

--- Create view
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[myView] AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/DCC/TestCSV*.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'CannabisTax',
            FORMAT='CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].C2='Q3xx'
